name: EYEBALL CONTACT!
description:
EYEBALL CONTACT! is a physics based platformer made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The entire game, as well as all the assets used were created from scratch in less than 48 hours.

The theme was "Joined Together".

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME:

Play the game using the F and J keys on your keyboard.

HOW TO RUN THE GAME:

The .jar file should be sufficient to run the game on most systems, assuming you have Java installed. If the .jar file does not run for some reason, you can download and play the system-specific files. Simply unzip the file and run the executable inside.
